name: compare-string
description: Pure JS package that compares similarity of strings using a combination of [Jaccard's Index](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%B8rensen%E2%80%93Dice_coefficient) and [Sørensen–Dice Coefficient](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%C3%B8rensen%E2%80%93Dice_coefficient). Can generally return faster, more accurate results than edit-distance based algorithms, such as Levenshtein Distance.
author: saberscientist
